job_tasks.phrase: meewerken aan innovatieve oplossingen binnen een sportieve werkomgeving
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates working on innovative solutions within a specific environment, suggesting an understanding of the business context and its goals.

job_tasks.phrase: draag je direct bij aan vernieuwing in de sportsector
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights contributing to innovation in the sports sector, demonstrating an understanding of the industry's needs and strategic direction.

job_tasks.phrase: om Nederland tegen 2032 het sportiefste land ter wereld te maken.
job_tasks.justification: This states the overarching mission of the organization, which the role is expected to contribute to, showing alignment with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: versterken van de maatschappelijke waarde van sport.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a focus on the broader impact and value proposition of sport, which aligns with understanding business and societal objectives.
Developing AI applications directly falls under the umbrella of creating and implementing models.

job_tasks.phrase: de juiste AI tools te kiezen als onderdeel van de oplossing.
job_tasks.justification: Choosing the right AI tools implies selecting and potentially adapting models for specific solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: implementeren, zodat deze aan het einde van het jaar breed binnen de organisatie worden gebruikt.
job_tasks.justification: Implementing AI applications for broad organizational use requires software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: oplossingen te creëren die direct impact hebben op de werknemers en processen binnen het bedrijf.
job_tasks.justification: Creating solutions that impact employees and processes suggests building and deploying software-based applications.

soft_skills.phrase: Volg jij een HBO/WO-studie in een data AI- gerelateerde richting
puzzelen, experimenteren en vernieuwend bezig zijn

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on developing and implementing AI applications to improve productivity and quality. While it mentions AI, it lacks specific details about advanced modeling techniques, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer. The role also doesn't emphasize MLOps or predictive modeling as core functions of an ML Engineer.
